entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 11:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of hail this evening and after midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023
